name: iqair
title: Air Quality
description: Check air quality (AQI, PM2.5, PM10 and other pollutants) for cities worldwide using IQAir data.

preferences.name: defaultCity
preferences.title: Default City
preferences.description: Default city to use when no city is specified (e.g., Moscow, London, Tashkent)

commands.name: iqair
commands.title: Check Air Quality
commands.description: Check air quality for any city using IQAir data.
commands.subtitle: IQAir

arguments.name: city
arguments.placeholder: City name (optional, uses default city if empty)

commands.name: iqair-top
commands.title: Top Polluted Cities
commands.description: View the most polluted cities ranked by current AQI.
commands.subtitle: IQAir

" && exit 1
